name: BONEVILLE BOBBER
description: The Boneville Bobber is a classic retro-styled cruiser motorcycle with a powerful 1,200cc V-twin engine and comfortable riding position. It features a sleek, minimalist design with a low-slung seat, fat tires, and a hardtail-style rear suspension.

name: Royal Enfield Hunter 350
description: The Royal Enfield Hunter 350 is a versatile adventure bike suitable for both city commutes and off-road adventures. It has a lightweight yet robust chassis, long-travel suspension, and a capable 350cc single-cylinder engine.

name: Yamaha MT 15 V2
description: The Yamaha MT 15 V2 is a stylish and sporty naked bike with excellent performance and handling. It features a liquid-cooled 155cc engine, lightweight chassis, and aggressive street-fighter styling.

name: Continental GT 650
description: The Continental GT 650 is a high-performance touring motorcycle designed for long-distance rides and comfort. It boasts a 648cc parallel-twin engine, retro-inspired styling, and modern amenities like a windscreen and saddlebags.

name: BMW S 1000 RR
description: The BMW S 1000 RR is a top-of-the-line superbike with cutting-edge technology and unmatched performance. It features a 999cc inline-four engine, advanced electronics, and aerodynamic bodywork designed for track domination.

name: Harley-Davidson Sportster S
description: The Harley-Davidson Sportster S is a classic cruiser motorcycle with iconic styling and powerful performance. It features a liquid-cooled Revolution Max 1250 V-twin engine, lightweight chassis, and modern amenities like a TFT display and advanced rider aids.
